item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
The Lizard Kings are the supreme priestly authority in C'tis. They receive physical, mental and religious training from the moment they are hatched. Lizard Kings command all and lead the sacred services in the Temple City. They are formidable leaders, powerful warriors and mighty priests. They have partial resistance to poison.
